upcomingEvents.title: Intergenerational Storytelling Circle
upcomingEvents.description: Share stories across generations and discover common threads in our experiences.

upcomingEvents.title: Senior Leadership Summit
upcomingEvents.description: Empowering senior voices in community leadership and decision-making.

upcomingEvents.title: Caregiver Support Group
upcomingEvents.description: Monthly gathering for caregivers to share experiences and resources.

projects.title: Digital Literacy Exchange
projects.goal: Bridge the digital divide through peer-to-peer learning
projects.description: Young volunteers teach technology skills while learning life wisdom from senior participants.
projects.impact: 85% of participants report increased confidence with technology

projects.title: Community Oral History Project
projects.description: Recording and archiving stories from community elders for future generations.
projects.impact: Over 100 hours of stories collected and preserved
